name: 决战喵星 (Naughty Kitties)
summary:
The Cat’s Planet is in danger!! Aliens attacked the homeland of cats. All the adults on the planet lie in the dust. Only some kittens are trying to flee away with spaceship. Your mission is to lead them to fight and break through the encirclement of the enemies. Survival is the only way to protect the last hope of the Cat’s Planet!
Innovative genre: tower defense mixed with endless running* Super cute art style * Drag & Drop to play* 3 scenarios to adventure* Combo system as in match3 game* Abundant breeds of kitties with diverse weapons and functions* Variant types of ships to unlock* Upgrade the kitties and ships to gain more power
Naughty Kitties, a fast-paced tower defense, is just what you need for a change!
